visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with a custom color scheme. Additionally, configure the chart with custom margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9) with custom margins for better spacing. The title and axis labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis title indicates the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly temperature data with a custom color (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
